editUserSubtitle: Fill in the new fields for this user.
title: New operator
userPassDescription: Create a username and password for the new user. You can also generate an automatic password by clicking on the generate password button. Remember to copy and send the credentials to the operator after this process.

fields.name: Name
fields.label: label
fields.passwordHelper: Must have at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a !%*#?& symbol.

form.passwordError: Invalid password. Must have at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a !%*#?& symbol.
form.operatorError: The operator type must be selected
form.alreadyExists: Login already exists, please try another one
form.errorOnCreate: User couldn't be created due to an internal error. Please try again
form.errorOnEdit: User couldn't be edited due to an internal error. Please try again

customer.addDescription: Create a username and password for the new user. You can also generate an automatic password by clicking on the generate password button. Remember to copy and send the credentials to the user after this process.

deleteModal.title: Delete user account
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the user {{userId}}?
deleteModal.messageOwner: Are you sure you want to delete your own account?
deleteModal.warning: Deleting this account will remove all the information from this user. This action cannot be undone.
